description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:16.2"(41.14cm) Liquid Retina XDR display
Процесор:Apple M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU, 19‑core GPU, 16‑core Neural Engine

Резолуција:(3456 x 2234) Liquid Retina XDR, 1000 nits, 120 Hz

Charging
